title: 1.44 CONFRONT
content:
CONFRONT (QUIET), GO TO 1.44ACONFRONT (UMBRA), GO TO 1.44BCONFRONT (OL’ BLOODY CLICKER), GO TO 1.44C

1.44A

You stand over Quiet’s lifeless body. A beautiful being, even in death. You know that many in the Valley will sleep better when they hear 17 the news, but their joy will be tempered. A being of great power has departed, and all will mourn her passing.

Complete the LURE (QUIET) mission. Permanently remove Quiet from the Valley set. Gain the Lynx Fur Cloak reward card. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.

1.44B

You watch the huge raptor as it drops lower and lower in the sky, before crashing into the grass of a clearing. You know that many in the Valley will sleep better when they hear the news, but their joy will be tempered. A being of great power has departed, and all will mourn its passing.

Complete the LURE (UMBRA) mission. Permanently remove Umbra from the Valley set. Gain the Umbral Claw reward card. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.

1.44C

You stand over the lifeless form of Ol' Bloody Clicker. Where he once seemed alien and threatening, he now appears strangely beautiful. You know that many in the Valley will sleep better when they hear the news, but their joy will be tempered. A being of great power has departed, and all will mourn its passing.

Complete the LURE (OL’ BLOODY CLICKER) mission. Permanently remove Ol’ Bloody Clicker from the Valley set. Gain the Scuttler Tunnel reward card. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
